post:
**HostKoi Web Service, LLC** is pleased to offer the LET community our April hosting deals. For a full list of our plans please see our website at [www.hostkoi.com](http://www.hostkoi.com)

We are registered in the state of Pennsylvania as HostKoi Web Services, LLC business number 6359591. 

**Why Choose Us?**

- 90 Day Money Back Guarantee
- Quality Service and Affordable Prices.- Friendly Staff.
- Fast Support.
- Free Account Migration.
- We offer Custom Solutions for your needs.
- We offer Shared, Reseller, VPS and Dedicated Hosting Services.
- Daily Backups.

**Features:**

- Instant Setup
- cPanel
- Unlimited Addon/Parked Domains (Host Unlimited Domains)
- Unlimited Subdomains
- Unlimited FTP
- Unlimited MySQL Databases
- Unlimited Email Accounts
- Softaculous (1 click install) Script Installer
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- 24x7 Support 
- Free Account Migration!

**LET-April** / Disks: 50GB Raid 10 / Bandwidth: 100GB / $7.00 per Year / [Order Here](https://hostkoi.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=81)

**LET-April Plus** / Disks: 75GB Raid 10 / Bandwidth: 150GB / $10.00 per year / [Order Here](https://hostkoi.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=82)

Test IP: 199.15.252.61

Location: West Virgina

We also offer custom hosting plans, you can contact our sales department by [clicking here](https://hostkoi.com/clients/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2) and telling us your requirements and budget.
